label: Helio Webhook
name: helioWebhook
description: Start workflow whenever Helio webhook event happened

networks.label: Network
networks.name: network
networks.description: Network to execute API: Test or Prod

options.label: New payment on Pay Link
options.name: CREATED
options.description: Triggered upon new payment on the Pay Link

options.label: New subscription on Pay Stream
options.name: STARTED
options.description: Triggered upon new subscription/stream started on the Pay Stream

options.label: Cancellation of subscription on Pay Stream
options.name: ENDED
options.description: Triggered when a subscription/stream was stopped/ended on the Pay Stream

inputParameters.label: Pay Link Id
inputParameters.name: paylinkId
inputParameters.description: For example, pay link id of https://hel.io/pay/63ea24cc1ea62a8e0d272444 is 63ea24cc1ea62a8e0d272444

inputParameters.label: Pay Stream Id
inputParameters.name: streamId
inputParameters.description: For example, pay stream id of https://hel.io/pay/63ea543143507a1df4f6fccf is 63ea543143507a1df4f6fccf
